Class ImageDisplayStatusPanel

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener, java.io.Serializable
public class ImageDisplayStatusPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.awt.event.MouseMotionListener

Displays the image coordinates, pixel value, and world coordinates at the mouse pointer position.

See Also:
